text: The Sexy Sounds of Freezepop is a 2008 extended play released by the band Freezepop as a promotion for their album Future Future Future Perfect. == Track listing == == Personnel == === Performance === Freezepop: * The Duke of Candied Apples * Liz Enthusiasm * Sean T. Drinkwater == References == == External links == * Freezepop.net * https://www.discogs.com/Freezepop-The- Sexy-Sounds-Of-Freezepop-Our-Synth-Heroes-Dim-The-Strobelights/release/1434749 Category:2008 EPs Category:Freezepop albums
title: The Sexy Sounds of Freezepop
